description: Numbers that are congruent to {2, 3} mod 7.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n)=7*n-a(n-1)-9, n>1 [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]G.f. x*(2+x+4*x^2) / ( (1+x)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Dec 04 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
